featured.text: Why is Howard Chang specifically mentioned in the passage? 4.
“My weight dropped to 48.3 from 54.4 kilograms, and my classmates won’t be able to call me ‘porker’ anymore,” Chang said happily.
The students lost an average of 2.34 kilograms during the past two months, and the student who lost the most, the nine-year-old Howard Chang, shed more than six kilograms.
Mr. Chang always tries to answer all questions from his students.

other.text: When asked what he most wanted to do following the accomplishment, Chang replied, “Eat at McDonald’s.”
Because Mr. Chang has been busy these days, it's whether he will come to the party.
Or telephone Ms. (2) Have interest or experience in marketing Chang at 2945-0027 for an immediate interview.

definition.zh_def: 改變或變化的過程或結果。
definition.en_def: The process or result of making something different.
definition.example: The chang in weather surprised everyone.
